answers.answer: Hi,I do not think the diabetes you had during your pregnancy had anything to do with the pancreatic mass (that would be an unusual situation where much of the pancreas is no longer working because of the mass). The vision problems may or may not be related--some pancreatic masses can be related to pituitary problems and that can cause vision deficits.In either case I think this should be very aggressively evaluated and treatment plan developed in the very near future. Please be sure to press your doctor on this and ensure that all studies and referrals are done as soon as possible.Take care.
